If you want it extra sweet, add both cans. We like it somewhere in between. This recipe is from Commander's Palace in New Orleans, LA. Read more about the restaurant's legendary Family Meal here.Ingredients8 servings8oz. chicory coffee blend (1½ cups)1–214-oz. cans sweetened condensed milk2tsp. vanilla extractPreparationStep 1Place coffee in a large bowl and add 8 cups cold water. Stir gently to make sure all of the grounds are moistened. Chill overnight.Step 2Line a sieve with a coffee filter and place over a pitcher. Strain coffee into pitcher (do not stir); discard solids. Stir in 1 can sweetened condensed milk and vanilla extract. If you like your coffee sweeter, add more milk.Step 3Do Ahead: Strained cold brew can be made 1 week ahead. Cover and chill.
